name: Find The Silvers Typing Fun - Easter 2023
name_original: Find The Silvers Typing Fun - Easter 2023
description:
Oh no! the Robot Silvers have Invaded the Small Town of SilverVille

Use your Typing Skills to remove the Robot Silvers before it is Too Late!

Silver character belongs to Silver

Code and other sprites by Miastonished

Troubleshooting:

if the game is a white screen on startup try deleting uh the DATA.FTS file, then  try again

if the game is filled with blood do not play the game. Turn off your computer and never    again
